name: SHIFT (itch) (blublu)
description:
HINT 1: go up
HINT 2: press shift (at the same time)

controls: 
player 1: wasd + left shift 
player 2: arrows + right shift
tall character: double tap up to dash
large character: double tap left/right to dash 

bug: ❗🛑❌⛔
shift keys get stuck in the browser. workarounds:
- use Q / L instead
- or use the downloaded version

credits:
code: david abraham & lazlo bonin
music: "CH-AY-NA" by Spring
sfx: "8bit SFX" by celestialghost8

HINT 3: don't die

post your high score in the comments
